about.me: We graduated from the premier engineering institute in India. Our invaluable years of industry experience from core technical to service sector will help make projects sustainable. We believe in giving back to society for the welfare of the lesser privileged. We believe Cardano will change the existing financial system and make the world a better place to live in with equal opportunities. We have committed to going a long way.
about.server: Our infrastructure setup is hybrid, based on the cloud and bare metal server in-house, protected with firewalls and additional layers of security. The data centers we are using are protected 24/7, and we plan to run several relay nodes to secure our stake pool further. We monitor our servers 24/7 to prevent any downtime. We have committed to providing a reliable staking service.
